summary: This node allows reading or writing files on the computer that runs n8n.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select whether to read file(s) from disk or write a file to disk.

parameters.name: fileselector
parameters.description: Specify a file's path or path pattern to read multiple files. Always use forward-slashes for path separator even on Windows.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options for reading files, such as file extension, file name, mime type, and output field name.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Path and name of the file that should be written. Include the file extension.

parameters.name: datapropertyname
parameters.description: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options for writing files, such as whether to append to an existing file.
